subject: Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
organizations: State University of New York at Binghamton
lead_paragraph: Lois DeFleur said in an e-mail message to the faculty that she was leaving in July because of her mother’s fragile health and her plans to be married.
snippet: Lois DeFleur said in an e-mail message to the faculty that she was leaving in July because of her mother’s fragile health and her plans to be married.
